response.overview: Wissam is a wealthy young man who does not believe in the idea of love at all, and the fact that most of his wealth from the sale of losers or those suffering from financial problems, and accidentally recognizes a waitress working in a bar and trying to make money from courtesy customers, Wissam believes she is a saleswoman, and offers to accompany him In a group of his own business meetings for a whole month.
response.title: لأنى بحبك
